ValidationRule.description: Status Description for S2S cannot contain out of office
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.Name ="Sales2Service Case" , OR( CONTAINS( Status_Description__c ,"Out of Office"), CONTAINS( Status_Description__c ,"out of office"), CONTAINS( Status_Description__c ,"Out of the office"), CONTAINS( Status_Description__c ,"Out of the Office"), CONTAINS( Status_Description__c ,"out of the office") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status Description cannot contain the phrases "out of office" or "out of the office". Please revise prior to saving.
